title: Wednesday, Feb. 8, 2017
description: The travel ban litigation, live-streamed. And why the 60-year-old words of the novelist James Baldwin captured in the film “I Am Not Your Negro” are so resonant right now.
author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
